captions.text: It's been a long time
We've been together
I thought you'd always be by my side
looking at me only
But you're different these days
From the way you look at me to everything else
You seem to be pushing me away
Tell me the reason, what's the problem
It feels so far, the distance between you and me
I think I see the end of our relationship
I'm not confident about us
No, I haven't changed but it's just
you keep drifting away, and me too
You're like an empty shell since you've changed
I'm like a lost child waiting for you, yeah
You you you why are you
I I I why am I
I can't do anything without you
Your deep eyes focused on just me
Changing, it's changing
Your lips that would only call for me
Changing, it's changing
Our clasped hands slowly letting go
Changing, it's changing
You know nothing lasts forever
Changing, it's changing
Wait, something is kind of weird
We keep fighting, day after day
The way you talk, the faces you make are different
Just tell me up front, we do what we hate
Habitual routine dates I'm sick and tired
But it's not like I don't like you or anything
Together I'm lonely, apart I miss you
You're like mine but not really
My feet drag on
I walk in circles, the same spot over and over
I explain what you suspect isn't true in Korean
But you don't understand as if you speak French
The farther we drift, our feet dig into the ground
You were in love with me before, but you don't even listen anymore
It's okay for you and not for me, I don't get it
We hang out in silence, we don't talk
I turned my phone off and went out
I turned the switch off to my phone and you
I make eye contact with the ladies on the streets
But it feels weird, I keep being reminded of you
Wherever I go, I see traces of us
I can't get away from you no matter where I go
You're like an empty shell since you've changed
I'm like a lost child waiting for you, yeah
You you you why are you
I I I why am I
I can't do anything without you
Yeah, yeah
No I won't let you go
Yeah, yeah
No
When you said let's spend time apart
I said okay, I thought I'd get over you in no time
But memories become even more clear
I remember you wherever I go, I realized
My answer is you
You're like an empty shell since you've changed
I'm like a lost child waiting for you, yeah
You you you why are you
I I I why am I
I can't do anything without you
Your deep eyes focused on just me
Changing, it's changing
Your lips that would only call for me
Changing, it's changing
Our clasped hands slowly letting go
Changing, it's changing
You know nothing lasts forever
Changing, it's changing
Why are We?

comments.text:
HOW DO I NOT EVEN KNOW THIS GRP EXISTS?!! so i've heard of bumkey and am 
constantly blown away by his music (his drug scandal not so much smh; i 
hope it isn't true but if it is, i'm not gna mollycoddle him and wld prefer 
it if he owns up to it) his song 'attraction' is one of my fave kpop songs 
EVER but i never even knew that he's actually the leader of this grp?? i 
came here after listening to kanto's song with 15& 'love is madness' (give 
some love to them pls these girls are amazingggg) and i don't regret it one 
bit #newfanoverhere﻿
